description: Start a shell shock sequence for the player. The shell shock must be precached, otherwise calling this script will cause a script error.

params.name: shellshockname
description: Name of the shell shock sequence.

params.name: duration
description: Duration in seconds. Must be between 0 and 60 seconds.

params.name: overrideCheat
description: Certain player cheats can disable this function, set this to true to force the issue.
